topic.title: How to Change the Links to the Privacy Policy and Terms

body.p: It is possible for the Feedback Platform Admin to change the links for the Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions that are displayed at the bottom of the login page by setting the following properties in the config/feedback-application.properties file:feedback.product.privacy.policy.url=[URL to your Privacy Policy] feedback.product.terms.url=[URL to your Terms and Conditions]
